pr_title: ST: Add test to cover labels and annotations for user secrets

timeline.message:
Add test to cover labels and annotations for user secrets

Signed-off-by: Jakub Stejskal <xstejs24@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: I think that in general it is better to use different keys and values - that way the test can make sure that the code doesn't not use the the other way around for example.
timeline.author: scholzj
